title: Week 10 Recap, Saints/Vikings/Rams Continue To Impress, Embarrassing Giants (Football 11/13)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora break down Week 10 action across the NFL. First, Nick and Pete analyze an embarrassing Giants' loss and what it means for the future or lack thereof of Ben McAdoo in New York. Then, they discuss the Saints identity shift and how it has paid dividends for the NFC South leader, and a bad offensive line performance by Dallas in the Zeke-less Cowboys' loss to Atlanta. JLC joins the guys to talk the Steelers pulling out another victory, Case Keenum continuing to impress, and the Rams rolling. The recap also includes analysis on the AFC South race and some bad coaching across the league.
